Name: Pepenero
Review Text:
Absolutely amazing experience.

The best italian food i've had in Netherlands, a true italian experience which …

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Such a pleasure to go back to one of your favorite restaurants and enjoy great Italian food. Marco and his team make you feel welcome. Pepe Nero is always a good choice in a nice and not too crowded setting

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: My fav Italian in town. Whatever one gets from the menu is delicious. But do try the melanzane, the spaghetti pomodori in a cheese wheel and the sgroppino made on the spot. Fabulous!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text:
Really good food and service!
Highly recommended

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Amazing food!!! One of our favorite restaurants. You need the make a reservation on time, but it is definitely worth it. Friendly staff too.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Such a great Italian place. Everything feels homemade and the service is great. The truffle pasta is heaven on a plate!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Food in general is not bad yet was not exceeding expectation which was high. There was too much oil on octopus carpaccio. Black pasta was good tho.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: What an amazing experience! Great ambiance, the food was delicious, authentic and sophisticated and the staff were all so professional and friendly ! Would highly recommend

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Had a lovely dinner here recently. Compliments to the kitchen and to Massimiliano, the very kind waiter I had that night :)

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Great experience. Lively atmosphere without overly noisy or crowded. Attentive service and excellent food at fair prices. Highly recommended.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Wonderful experience, the food excellent the service is personal and exceptional. The prices are very reasonable. My wife had the four course meal and I had steak with real truffles. All the dishes were super delicious, will definitely go back. Southern Italian cooking rules! :-)

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: What wonderful night! And to second another reviewer: best Italian restaurant! It was a dinner to celebrate my birthday. Fifteen people. The whole experience was nothing short of enchanting. We were so well looked after, service was …

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: The best Italian restaurant I've been to in Amsterdam over the past 5 years living here. The food was amazing, served in copious portions and the service was excellent. …

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: As most reviewers say, best Italian food I've had in Amsterdam. Very warm Manager (owner?), was able to fit us in after we made an error in our reservation. Note: it gets very busy so relax and enjoy, don't expect a quick turn here. Will be back.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: I organized a dinner here and it was really wonderful! The food was absolutely amazing and the next day everyone was still talking about how good it was (food and atmosphere and everything!). The staff were very friendly and polite and I will definitely be going back soon! :)

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Excellent carbonara and excellent cheesecake. Best Italian I’ve had in amsterdam. Most reasonably priced also.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Went there with a friend. Ordered a Tagliata which was brought to my table floating in balsamic vinigar. Told the waitress who looked at my plate and commented:"Oh I see, you have indeed lots of balsamic in your plate,I shall pass the …

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: I lived in Italy for 15 years, this restaurant serves some of the best Italian food I have ever had the pleasure of eating! Great staff, great service.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Outstanding! The three course chefs menu was fantastic (especially the mixed antipasti!!). Service was phenomenal as well. Highly recommended.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Absolutely delicious, with fabulous Italians serving you

Name: Pepenero
Review Text:
Lovely food, real italian, super service.
I would suggest the melanzane alla parmigiana !

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: The food was great, the sgroppino was excellent, but truly outstanding was the service and attention the owner and staff paid to our table. Would highly recommend, going to add this to our regulars rotation.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Can't say much about the food. They took 30min to bring us a menu while there was one waiter passing in front of our table every 30s. Expect long waits for anything. So in the end we took our coats and went to casa nostra which was much nicer and better.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Excellent Italian restaurant with very friendly staff

Name: Pepenero
Review Text:
Very friendly staff. Beautiful classical vibe. Food to look forward to all day. Wine to make you sit back and enjoy the night.
5 out 5. Will be back soon!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: good restaurant in Amsterdam if you want to eat Italian, friendly and professional staff, good quality food

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Starter and dessert were very good, but the main course lacked some flavour. Also, when ordering drinks we had to wait quite long and sometimes wondered if the order was forgotten.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: We stumbled across this restaurant on our first night in Amsterdam and what a find it was! Delicious and very nice atmosphere! We were made to feel very welcome.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Amazing food and a great experience and hospitality. One of the best Italian restaurants I’ve been to in the Netherlands! Go!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Excellent food, nice atmosphere and superb service. Just ask Marco if his chef can make some specials.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Nice ambience, tasty food. Tomatoe soup was excellent, truffle spaghetti with too much oil on my taste.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Hesitant to tell the world about this gem... it's already hard enough to get a table. The antipasti are outstanding and the main courses keep up with them. Don't tell anyone...

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Great food, nice people. I should give them five stars, but I'm afraid to spoil them...

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Overall good service and food.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Absolutely exquisite food, very friendly staff, good location and crisp interior. The 'DIY' tiramisu is epic

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: As always: Fantastico. By far the best Italian restaurant I know in Amsterdam

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Excellent service, incredible food. Worth many more visits.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Great restaurant, with great Italian food. Try to book in advance.

Review Text:
BEST ITALIAN RESTAURANT

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Gisteren voor de eerste keer gegeten bij Pepenero. Wat een geweldige plek, sfeervolle inrichting, Italiaanse bediening, erg vriendelijk, en niet te vergeten het heerlijke eten. Vooral de spaghetti uit de Parmezaanse kaas die aan tafel bereid wordt, echt heerlijk!! Ook de voorgerechten en desserts, heerlijk. We komen zeker terug…
